articles.title: Apple Argued Safari Is Three Different Browsers to Avoid Regulation - MacRumors
articles.description: Apple recently claimed that Safari is three different browsers in effort to avoid regulation in the European Union (via The Register).   The claim...
articles.content:
Apple recently claimed that Safari is three different browsers in effort to avoid regulation in the European Union (via The Register).
The claim came as part of a response to the European Union in A… [+2564 chars]
